game_description: This is a work in progress, dedicated to explore the possiblities of Virtual Reality. Available Features: Paperplanes RC Drone RC Flacon9 Rocket Balloon Gun Regular Gun Paper Plane Gun Whiteboard with Pen A Basket Ball Darts Spawnable and Custumizable Gravity Balls Spawnable Connection Cubes And more to come! This is application is specifically build for the Meta Quest.
review_1: Tbh it sucks please if you are going to buy this game please don’t it’s not worth 2$ if you are going to buy this game don’t buy ether bonelab or sports mode those game are way better than this game please do not waste your money on this game
